meanings.sent1: She deled the unnecessary files from her computer.
meanings.sent2: He deled the old messages to free up space.
meanings.sent3: The cat deled the toy mouse under the couch.
meanings.sent4: The eraser deled the mistake on the paper.
meanings.sent5: The broom deled the dust bunnies in the corner.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she deled the outdated contacts.
